text: Ezɨ Solomon uaghan 12plan gumazir dapanibav sefe. Eghtɨ me Israelɨn distrighɨn 12pla gativagh dar dagheba iniva, egh atrivim ko gumazamizir a ko an dɨpenimɨn itiba bagh da amangɨtɨ, me dar amam. Azeniba bar zurara, 12plan iakɨnibar tongɨn, iakɨnir vamɨra, distrighɨn kaba vaghvagh men iakɨnimra, me dagheba isɨ atrivim ko an dɨpenimɨn itir adarasi, me daghebar men akurvagham.
